message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I've got to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $160, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $140?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to meet you at $155, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $145?
I'm getting very close to my minimum price, and I think we're close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is my absolute lowest price. Let's make a deal!
